Reviews.Title: regreats
Reviews.Author: glenda filyaw
Reviews.Content: Good as a tablet . but dont work well as a phone / That way why i bought this tablet  because it stated it was gsm unlocked cell phone . well this dont work well as a phone

Reviews.Title: dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: shota
Reviews.Content: this GSM 7-in Android 4.0 ICS Smart Cell Phone screen was very very Lined. I am very dissatisfied of this item

Reviews.Title: about the phablet GSM I ORDERED
Reviews.Author: mark hairston
Reviews.Content: It doesnt work well as a phone cant get a signal anywhere, also i tried watching hulu movies on it and it does'nt carry strong enough signal to watch the simplest movies on hulu

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Lamiya
Reviews.Content: It freezes up. When Im on instagram and watch a video, it freezes up on me. Overall though, it's okay

Reviews.Title: this is a good handy device
Reviews.Author: Karen Walton
Reviews.Content: 2013 is the rise of the phablet in the usa- its already wildly popular everywhere else.this is performing well for me and you will see more and more smart phone tablets hit the ground running
